title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC

content: I have been given multiple opendimes by a collector and asked to sell them here. These were loaded by pooler (litecoinpool.org) directly with block rewards as follows:4 with 25 Litecoins ea --- 2 have miner fees and 2 do not due to the Litecoin blocks had no transactions.25 with 1 Litecoin each - all were direct loaded from a single block reward - so the 25th opendime has 1.00086035 LTC.all will be verified as sealed and intact/secure prior to shipping.These were loaded in 2019, prior to Litecoins halving.here is the txn that loaded the 25 opendimes that are loaded with 1 LTC ea: https://chain.so/tx/LTC/875eb9c431c599960771a167c2a8acffdb980006ace9613a0fb0d60858faabc8each opendime will also include a 3d printed case with the block height printed on the bottom of the casethe price per opendime is as follows:the four with 25 LTC: 30 LTC eathe 25 with 1 LTC: 2 LTC eaPayment: Litecoin address: LUA1jtK65rGifTnP9JEmRHH4o99DNvDNXM
